scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER=true node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js

scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js & cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER=true node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.watchssl: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SECURE=true node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js & cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER=true SECURE=true node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js

scripts.hotssl: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SECURE=true node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server.js --inline --hot --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js --disable-host-check & cross-env NODE_ENV=development SECURE=true SERVER=true node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
